Clin:
Those who work together soon understand each other and begin to form bonds, you know. You've heard of esprit de corps, right? That sense of camaraderie can only be made in times of extreme suffering. That's why boot camp is so draining - they do it to establish group mentality... the physical conditional is just a bonus.
